content: It was innovation in Muslim communities that developed the order of algebra; our magnetic compass and tools of navigation; our mastery of pens and printing; our understanding of how disease spreads and how it can be healed.
translations: ita:È stata innovazione presso le comunità musulmane che si è sviluppato l'ordine dell'algebra; la nostra bussola magnetica
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by saeb (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
